NZ First leader Winston Peters claims former PM Jacinda Ardern never told him of Christchurch terrorist’s email in bizarre post https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz-first-leader-winston-peters-claims-former-pm-jacinda-ardern-never-told-him-of-christchurch-terrorists-email-in-奇怪的帖子/JN5O6LTLOVDHFIDZSQKF2D67ZE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz-first-leader-winston-peters-claims-former-pm-jacinda-ardern-never-told-him-of-christchurch-terrorists-email-in-奇怪的帖子/JN5O6LTLOVDHFIDZSQKF2D67ZE/ Rachel MaherThe day after the attack, Ardern's office confirmed they had received the email. Wed, 25 Oct 2023 07:43:42 +0000 Winston Peters, the deputy prime minister at the time, claimed today was the first the public had learned the Prime Minister’s Office had received the email.
Connor Boyd death: Both defendants accused of 18-year-old’s manslaughter testify https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/connor-boyd-death-both-defendants-accused-of-18-year-olds-manslaughter-testify/3L56VFNGDNBV5CCICDISZFWRTA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/connor-boyd-death-both-defendants-accused-of-18-year-olds-manslaughter-testify/3L56VFNGDNBV5CCICDISZFWRTA/ Craig KapitanDefendants tell court they were scared of victim on night of tragedy. Wed, 25 Oct 2023 07:17:31 +0000 A young couple with name suppression are on trial for manslaughter in the High Court at Auckland. The duo, both now 20, are accused of having caused the death of 18-year-old Connor Boyd. Photo / Dean Purcell
